module.name: shield
module.keywords: module, shield, electromagnetic, coupling, suppression, component

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of a shield, which is a component used for suppression of unwanted electromagnetic coupling among components.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Component feature, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1657;
items within the scope of application module Physical connectivity definition, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1755.
